CustomField.formula: IF ( IsVoid__c = TRUE, 'Void', IF ( AND ( Adjusted_by_Contract__r.IsVoid__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Adjusted_by_Contract__r.Adjustment_Type__c, 'Amendment') ), 'Amended', IF ( AND ( Adjusted_by_Contract__r.IsVoid__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Adjusted_by_Contract__r.Adjustment_Type__c, 'Replacement') ), 'Replaced', IF ( AND( Contract_Start_Date__c <= TODAY(), Contract_End_Date__c >= TODAY() ), 'Active', IF ( AND ( Adjusted_by_Contract__r.IsVoid__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Adjusted_by_Contract__r.Adjustment_Type__c, 'Renewal') ), 'Renewed', IF ( Contract_Start_Date__c > TODAY(), 'Upcoming', IF ( Contract_End_Date__c < TODAY(), 'Past', 'Invalid' ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Contract Status
